name: Heavy Loaded Trucker Parking
description:
Truck simulation hill driving is a brand new story game where you can enjoy transport simulation and crazy driving on same time. In this game pick up the goods and drive through the dangerous and challenging hill roads and drop the goods safely at the destination. This Truck Speed Drive is designed in a most beautiful and unique environment. It is a truck simulator 3d game which simulates your driving skills by offering you to drive realistic monster truck on various track in between mountains with best driving simulator . Come and play the most exciting truck driving game. Each level of truck driver is more challenging and more exciting than the previous one.
Your ultimate truck driving challenge begins as an off-road cargo truck transporter driving job. Drive your ultimate off-road hill climber truck while carrying heavy cargo. Show your truck driving skills as the real truck driver to drive heavy duty transporter truck carrying cargo. Drive your heavy transport truck carefully and try not to damage the cargo. Have you ever tried to drive heavy transport trucks? Try it now by playing Off-road cargo truck game. It is designed in the latest 3D technology providing the user with real road sensations as you will be playing while playing game. There are 2 trucks available with modern features for playing.
If you are very fond of driving games or parking games and keen to drive heavy trucks or park heavy trucks on these bumpy roads with stunning and astounding sound than this 3D Game is the absolutely the right choice to select and sooth your urge of driving and feeling like a real driver.
Features:
1. Smooth steering and tilt controls
2. Amazing 3d graphics & hill environment
3. Pick & drop to transport
4. Thrill of driving on hills, mountains
